body.p: Harrodsburg, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa Miller Portwood on December 23, 1848. Father of Armistead Portwood, John B. Portwood, Caleb D. Portwood, Willard C. Portwood, Emma R. Portwood, Jackson Portwood, and Lena H. Portwood. Hotel keeper in Harrodsburg in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Harrodsburg in 1860.
